original: Majjhima Nikāya 121
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cūḷasuññatasutta
analyzed: cūḷa suññata sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati pubbārāme migāra mātu pāsāde

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā

original: ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Ekamidaṁ, bhante, samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati nagarakaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamo.
analyzed: ekam idam bhante samayam bhagavā sakkesu viharati nagarakam nāma sakyānam nigamaḥ

original: Tattha me, bhante, bhagavato sammukhā sutaṁ, sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ:
analyzed: tattha me bhante bhagavato sammukhā suta sammukhā paṭiggahita

original: ‘suññatāvihārenāhaṁ, ānanda, etarahi bahulaṁ viharāmī’ti.
analyzed: suñña tā vihārena āha ānanda etarahi bahulam viharāmi iti

original: Kacci metaṁ, bhante, sussutaṁ suggahitaṁ sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritan”ti?
analyzed: kacci mā ita bhante sussutam suggahitam su manasikatam su upadhāritam ti

original: “Taggha te etaṁ, ānanda, sussutaṁ suggahitaṁ sumanasikataṁ sūpadhāritaṁ.
analyzed: tat ha te ete ānanda su sutam suggahitam su manasikatam su upadhārita

original: Pubbepāhaṁ, ānanda, etarahipi suññatāvihārena bahulaṁ viharāmi.
analyzed: pubbepāha ānanda etarahipi suñña tā vihārena bahulam viharāmi

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, ayaṁ migāramātupāsādo suñño hatthigavassavaḷavena, suñño jātarūparajatena, suñño itthipurisasannipātena atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathā api ānanda ayam migāra mātu pāsādaḥ suññaḥ hatthi gavassa vaḷavena suññaḥ jātarūpa rajatena suññaḥ itthi purisa sannipātena atthi ceva idam a suñña tam yat idam

original: bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṭicca ekattaṁ;
analyzed: bhikkhu saṅgham paṭicca ekatta

original: evameva kho, ānanda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvā gāmasaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā manussasaññaṁ, araññasaññaṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā gāma sañña a manasikaritvā manussa sañña arañña saññam paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa araññasaññāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa arañña saññāya cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ye assu darathā gāmasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, ye assu darathā manussasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, atthi cevāyaṁ darathamattā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: ye assu darathāḥ gāma saññam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathāḥ manussa saññam paṭicca te idha na santi atthi ca iva ayam daratha mattā yat idam

original: araññasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: arañña saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ gāmasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ manussasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: so suññam idam saññāgatam gāma saññāya ati pajānāti suññam idam saññāgatam manussa saññāya ati pajānāti atthi ceva idam a suññatam yat idam

original: araññasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: arañña saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: iti yat hi kho tattha na hoti tena tam suññam samanupassati yam pana tattha avasiṭṭham hoti tam santam idam atthi iti pajānāti

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā suñña tā avakkanti bhavati

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvā manussasaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā araññasaññaṁ, pathavīsaññaṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā manussa sañña a manasikaritvā arañña sañña pathavī saññam paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa pathavīsaññāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa pathavī saññāya cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, āsabhacammaṁ saṅkusatena suvihataṁ vigatavalikaṁ;
analyzed: seyyathā api ānanda āsabha cammam saṅku satena su vihatam vigata valika

original: evameva kho, ānanda, bhikkhu yaṁ imissā pathaviyā ukkūlavikkūlaṁ nadīviduggaṁ khāṇukaṇṭakaṭṭhānaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho ānanda bhikkhu yam imissā pathaviyāḥ ukkūla vikkūlam nadī viduggam

original: pabbatavisamaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ amanasikaritvā pathavīsaññaṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: pabbata visamam tam sabbam a manasikaritvā pathavī saññam paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa pathavīsaññāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa pathavī saññāya cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ye assu darathā manussasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, ye assu darathā araññasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, atthi cevāyaṁ darathamattā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: ye assu darathāḥ manussa saññam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathāḥ arañña saññam paṭicca te idha na santi atthi ca iva ayam daratha mattā yat idam

original: pathavīsaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: pathavī saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ manussasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ araññasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: so suññam idam saññāgatam manussa saññāya ati pajānāti suññam idam saññāgatam arañña saññāya ati pajānāti atthi ceva idam a suññatam yat idam

original: pathavīsaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: pathavī saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: iti yat hi kho tattha na hoti tena tam suññam samanupassati yam pana tattha avasiṭṭham hoti tam santam idam atthi iti pajānāti

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā suñña tā avakkanti bhavati

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvā araññasaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā pathavīsaññaṁ, ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā arañña sañña a manasikaritvā pathavī saññaḥ ākāsa anañca āyatana saññam paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa ākāsa anañcāyatana saññāya cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ye assu darathā araññasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, ye assu darathā pathavīsaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, atthi cevāyaṁ darathamattā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: ye assu darathāḥ arañña saññam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathā pathavī saññam paṭicca te idha na santi atthi ca iva ayam daratha mattā yat idam

original: ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: ākāsa anañcāyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ araññasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ pathavīsaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: so suññam idam saññāgatam arañña saññāya ati pajānāti suññam idam saññāgatam pathavī saññāya ati pajānāti atthi ceva idam a suññatam yat idam

original: ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: ākāsa anañcāyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: iti yat hi kho tattha na hoti tena tam suññam samanupassati yam pana tattha avasiṭṭham hoti tam santam idam atthi iti pajānāti

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā suñña tā avakkanti bhavati

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvā pathavīsaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṁ, viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā pathavī sañña a manasikaritvā ākāsa ānañca āyatana sañña viññāṇañcāyatana saññam paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa viññāṇañcāyatana saññāya cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ye assu darathā pathavīsaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, ye assu darathā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, atthi cevāyaṁ darathamattā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: ye assu darathā pathavī saññam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathāḥ ākāsa anañcāyatana saññam paṭicca te idha na santi atthi ca iva ayam daratha mattā yat idam

original: viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: viññāṇam ca āyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ pathavīsaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: so suññam idam saññā āgatam pathavī saññāya ati pajānāti suññam idam saññā āgatam ākāsa ānañca āyatana saññāya ati pajānāti atthi ceva idam a suññatam yat idam

original: viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: viññāṇam ca āyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: iti yat hi kho tattha na hoti tena tam suññam samanupassati yam pana tattha avasiṭṭham hoti tam santam idam atthi iti pajānāti

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā suñña tā avakkanti bhavati

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṁ, ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā ākāsānañca āyatana sañña a manasikaritvā viññāṇañca āyatana saññaḥ ākiñcaññāyatana saññam paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa ākiñcaññāyatana saññāya cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ye assu darathā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, ye assu darathā viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, atthi cevāyaṁ darathamattā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: ye assu darathāḥ ākāsa anañcāyatana saññam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathāḥ viññāṇañcāyatana saññam paṭicca te idha na santi atthi ca iva ayam daratha mattā yat idam

original: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: so suññam idam saññā āgatam ākāsānañca āyatana saññāya ati pajānāti suññam idam saññā āgatam viññāṇañcāyatana saññāya ati pajānāti atthi ceva idam a suññatam yat idam

original: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: iti yat hi kho tattha na hoti tena tam suññam samanupassati yam pana tattha avasiṭṭham hoti tam santam idam atthi iti pajānāti

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā suñña tā avakkanti bhavati

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda bhikkhu amanasikaritvā viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṁ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā viññāṇañca āyatana sañña a manasikaritvā ākiñcañña āyatana sañña nevasaññānāsaññāyatana saññam paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāya cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatana saññāya cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ye assu darathā viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, ye assu darathā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, atthi cevāyaṁ darathamattā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: ye assu darathāḥ viññāṇañca āyatana saññam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathāḥ ākiñcaññāyatana saññam paṭicca te idha na santi atthi ca iva ayam daratha mattā yat idam

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: nevasaññā anāsañña āyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ viññāṇañcāyatanasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: so suññam idam saññā āgatam viññāṇaṃ ca āyatana saññāya ati pajānāti suññam idam saññā āgatam ākiñcañña āyatana saññāya ati pajānāti atthi ceva idam a suññatam yat idam

original: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññaṁ paṭicca ekattan’ti.
analyzed: nevasaññā anāsañña āyatana saññam paṭicca ekattam ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā suñña tā avakkanti bhavati

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññaṁ, animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā ākiñcaññāyatana sañña a manasikaritvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana sañña animittam cetaḥ samādhim paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa animitte cetosamādhimhi cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.

analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

analyzed: ye assu darathāḥ ākiñcañña āyatana saññam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathāḥ nevasaññānāsaññāyatana saññam paṭicca te idha na santi atthi ca iva ayam daratha mattā yat idam

original: imameva kāyaṁ paṭicca saḷāyatanikaṁ jīvitapaccayā’ti.
analyzed: imam eva kāyam paṭicca saḷāyatanikam jīvita paccayā ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññāyā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—

original: imameva kāyaṁ paṭicca saḷāyatanikaṁ jīvitapaccayā’ti.
analyzed: imam eva kāyam paṭicca saḷāyatanikam jīvita paccayā ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: iti yat hi kho tattha na hoti tena tam suññam samanupassati yam pana tattha avasiṭṭham hoti tam santam idam atthi iti pajānāti

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā suñña tā avakkanti bhavati

original: Puna caparaṁ, ānanda, bhikkhu amanasikaritvā ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṁ, amanasikaritvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaññaṁ, animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ paṭicca manasi karoti ekattaṁ.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ ānanda bhikkhu a manasikaritvā ākiñcaññāyatana sañña a manasikaritvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatana sañña animittam cetaḥ samādhim paṭicca manasi karoti ekatta

original: Tassa animitte cetosamādhimhi cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
analyzed: tassa animitte cetosamādhimhi cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ayampi kho animitto cetosamādhi abhisaṅkhato abhisañcetayito’.
analyzed: ayam pi kho animittaḥ cetaḥ samādhi abhisaṅkhataḥ abhisañcetayito

original: ‘Yaṁ kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṁ abhisañcetayitaṁ tadaniccaṁ nirodhadhamman’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: yam kho pana kiñci abhisaṅkhatam abhisañcetayitam tat aniccam nirodha dhammanti pajānāti

original: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati, bhavāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati, avijjāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati.
analyzed: tassa evam jānataḥ evam passataḥ kāma āsavā api cittam vimuccati bhava āsavā api cittam vimuccati avijjā āsavā api cittam vimuccati

original: Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
analyzed: vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam hoti

original: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti

original: So evaṁ pajānāti:
analyzed: saḥ evam pajānāti

original: ‘ye assu darathā kāmāsavaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, ye assu darathā bhavāsavaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ye assu darathā kāma āsavam paṭicca te idha na santi ye assu darathā bhava āsavam paṭicca

original: tedha na santi, ye assu darathā avijjāsavaṁ paṭicca tedha na santi, atthi cevāyaṁ
analyzed: tedha na santi ye assu darathāḥ a vijja āsavam paṭicca tedha na santi atthi cevāya

original: darathamattā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: daratha mattā

original: imameva kāyaṁ paṭicca saḷāyatanikaṁ jīvitapaccayā’ti.
analyzed: imam eva kāyam paṭicca saḷāyatanikam jīvita paccayā ti

original: So ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ kāmāsavenā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ bhavāsavenā’ti pajānāti, ‘suññamidaṁ saññāgataṁ avijjāsavenā’ti pajānāti, ‘atthi cevidaṁ asuññataṁ yadidaṁ—
analyzed: so suññam idam saññāgatam kāma āsavena ati pajānāti suññam idam saññāgatam bhava āsavena ati pajānāti suññam idam saññāgatam avijjā āsavena ati pajānāti atthi ceva idam a suññatam yat idam

original: imameva kāyaṁ paṭicca saḷāyatanikaṁ jīvitapaccayā’ti.
analyzed: imam eva kāyam paṭicca saḷāyatanikam jīvita paccayā ti

original: Iti yañhi kho tattha na hoti tena taṁ suññaṁ samanupassati, yaṁ pana tattha avasiṭṭhaṁ hoti taṁ ‘santamidaṁ atthī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: iti yat hi kho tattha na hoti tena tam suññam samanupassati yam pana tattha avasiṭṭham hoti tam santam idam atthi iti pajānāti

original: Evampissa esā, ānanda, yathābhuccā avipallatthā parisuddhā paramānuttarā suññatāvakkanti bhavati.
analyzed: evam pissa esā ānanda yathābhuccā a vipallatthā parisuddhā paramā anuttarā suññatā avakkanti bhavati

original: Yepi hi keci, ānanda, atītamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā parisuddhaṁ paramānuttaraṁ
analyzed: ye api hi keci ānanda atīta maddhānam samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā parisuddham parama anuttara

original: suññataṁ upasampajja vihariṁsu, sabbe te imaṁyeva parisuddhaṁ paramānuttaraṁ suññataṁ
analyzed: suññatam upasampajja viharisu sabbe te imayā iva parisuddham parama anuttaram suññata

original: upasampajja vihariṁsu.
analyzed: upasampajja viharisu

original: Yepi hi keci, ānanda, anāgatamaddhānaṁ samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā parisuddhaṁ paramānuttaraṁ
analyzed: ye api hi keci ānanda anāgata maddhānam samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā parisuddham parama anuttara

original: suññataṁ upasampajja viharissanti, sabbe te imaṁyeva parisuddhaṁ paramānuttaraṁ suññataṁ
analyzed: suññatam upasampajja viharissanti sabbe te imayā iva parisuddham parama anuttaram suññata

original: upasampajja viharissanti.
analyzed: upasampajja viharissanti

original: Yepi hi keci, ānanda, etarahi samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā parisuddhaṁ paramānuttaraṁ suññataṁ
analyzed: ye api hi keci ānanda etarahi samaṇāḥ vā brāhmaṇāḥ vā parisuddham parama anuttaram

original: upasampajja viharanti, sabbe te imaṁyeva parisuddhaṁ paramānuttaraṁ suññataṁ upasampajja viharanti.
analyzed: upasampajja viharanti sabbe te imayā iva parisuddham parama anuttaram suññatam upasampajja viharanti

original: Tasmātiha, ānanda, ‘parisuddhaṁ paramānuttaraṁ suññataṁ upasampajja viharissāmā’ti—
analyzed: tasmā ati ha ānanda parisuddham parama anuttaram suññatam upasampajja viharissāma ati

original: evañhi vo, ānanda, sikkhitabban”ti.
analyzed: evam hi vaḥ ānanda sikkhitabbanti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Cūḷasuññatasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: cūḷasuññata suttam niṭṭhitam paṭhama
